Our Treatment

Acne Scars? Uneven skin tone? Stretch Marks? We Got You Covered! What To Expect During A Microneedling Treatment?

[vc_empty_space height=”30px”][vc_column_text]

Controlled injury that stimulates your own body’s growth factors for more youthful & radiant skin.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height=”60px”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”4240″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][vc_empty_space height=”30px”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]What Is Microneedling?[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]A Minimally Invasive Treatment That Uses Fine Needles to Create Micro-Perforations In The Skin. This Controlled Skin Injury Triggers The Body To Create New Collagen And Elastin. The Perforation Channels Start To Heal Within Minutes Of The Treatment Start. This Sets Of A Cascade Of Immune And Healing Responses Including:

  • New Collagen & Elastin Formation
  • Breakdown Of Damaged Cells And Melanin Related To Aging And Horomonal Influences
  • Increase In Cell Activity

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_column_text]

As Your Skin Heals, Collagen Is Produced And Many Common Signs Of Age And Wear Is Dissipated. The Result? Smoother, Firmer, More Even Looking Skin! Microneedling Is Sade For All Skin Colours And Types.

We Recommend A Minimum Of 3-6 Treatments Spaced 4-6 Weeks Apart. Numbing Cream Is Applied Before The Procedure.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”60px”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]Benefits Include:

  • Improves Fine Lines & Deep Wrinkles
  • Reduces Acne Scars
  • Softens Stretch Marks
  • Evens Skin Tone
  • Lightens Hyperpigmentation & Sun Spots
  • Reduces Appearance Of Pores
  • Tightens Up Lose Skin

Contraindications:

  • Keloid scars.
  • Active eczema.
  • Psoriasis and other chronic conditions.
  • History of actinic or solar keratosis.
  • History of herpes simplex infections.
  • History of diabetes.
  • Acne prone skin
  • Presence of raised moles in area to be treated.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”4239″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][vc_empty_space height=”30px”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height=”60px”][vc_column_text]

A customized hydra jelly/ collagen mask is included with every facial!
